ol.li: Product statement (what it does for whom, what it does not)
Personas - models of users (typical user, occasional user, etc.)
UseCases and Scenarios (use case is a list of actions defining the interactions between an actor and a system, use cases are derived from the business requirements)
WireFrames (schematic focusing on what the screen does, actions available to the user, etc.)

note.div: Parametry lidského vnímání a jejich vliv na návrh uživatelských rozhraní

ul.li: The user has a mental model of how the program works. When this mental model does not fit the reality, issues arise.
The short term memory can hold 3-5 "items" at once. The average user will have issues using a program that assumes they can hold more than 3 "items" at once in their short term memory.
